core.name: Heart of Prajna
core.description:
Leader Bonus:
Heart of Prajna: When Combo Hit Count exceeds 20, team gains 12% Physical DMG.

subskills.name: Heart of Prajna
subskills.description: Team gains 18% Physical DMG when Combo Hit Count exceeds 20.

core.name: Combo: Shunmetsu
core.description:
Penetrates enemy with a charged One Flash, dealing damage.
One Flash: 100% ATK of Physical DMG.
One Flash consumes Sakura Brands from enemies upon hit and unleashes One Slash, dealing 400% ATK of Physical DMG and knocking them airborne.

subskills.name: QTE: Void Triplex
subskills.description: Switch: Swift Kill. Triggers QTE when enemy is knocked airborne. Unleashes 3 blade waves, each wave dealing 50%+154% ATK of Physical DMG and adding 1 Sakura Count.

subskills.name: One Slash
subskills.description: Increases One Slash DMG to 400%+600% ATK of Physical DMG.

subskills.name: Chain Flash
subskills.description: Triggers One Flash 5 additional times (once for each Sakura Brand present) when there are multiple enemies marked with a Sakura Brand.

core.name: Passive
core.description:
Passive bonuses apply automatically.
Sakura Brand: Clears the Sakura Count on enemy once the count has reached 3 and inflicts a Sakura Brand. The Sakura Brand lasts for 10s.

subskills.name: Punctured Kabuto
subskills.description: Increases Crit Rate by X% and Crit DMG by X% when breaching the enemy's Elite Shield.

subskills.name: Sakura no Haku
subskills.description: Basic ATKs deal additional 35.0% ATK of Physical DMG to enemies without a Sakura Brand.

subskills.name: Iaido
subskills.description: Shortens CD of Ultimate Evasion by 4.0s.

core.name: Crimson Naraka
core.description:
Trigger Valkyrie burst to augment attack mode and gain Ignore Interrupt.
Burst deals 50% ATK of DMG and inflicts a Sakura Brand onto enemy. SP Cost: 100.
After activation, Basic ATKs turn into One Flash. Hitting an enemy with this One Flash adds 1 Sakura Count. Duration: 10s.

subskills.name: Blinding Draw
subskills.description: When unleashing Ultimate, deal 50%+200.0% ATK of Physical DMG to surrounding enemies.

subskills.name: Ardor
subskills.description: Increases Crit DMG by 40.0% during Ultimate.

core.name: Shuryu Slash
core.description:
Quick dash to evade enemy attacks.
Ultimate Evasion: Generates a 3-sequence sword aura, each hit dealing 10% ATK of Physical DMG to surrounding enemies.
Shuryu Slash: Each sword aura hit adds a Sakura count onto the target upon Ultimate Evasion. CD: 15s.

subskills.name: Lethal Mark
subskills.description: Enhances the sword barrage generated upon an Ultimate Evasion, with each hit gaining 60.0% ATK of Physical DMG.

subskills.name: Zanshin
subskills.description: Upon Ultimate Evasion, gain 20.0% Attack Speed for 4.0s to self.

core.name: Sakuraoti
core.description:
Switch 6-sequence slash attack.
1st Sequence: 50% ATK of DMG.
2nd Sequence: 70% ATK of DMG.
3rd Sequence: 100% ATK of DMG.
4th Sequence: 120% ATK of DMG.
5th Sequence: 120% ATK of DMG.
6th Sequence: 150% ATK of DMG.
The 3rd and 5th sequences of the Basic ATK adds 1 Sakura Count to the target.

subskills.name: Thorny Blossoms
subskills.description: 20.0% chance to bleed enemies hit, dealing 32.0 DMG every 0.5s for 5.0s.

subskills.name: Flourish
subskills.description: When Combo Hit Count exceeds 20 and 50, gain 29.0% and 50.0% Total DMG Multiplier respectively.

subskills.name: San-Ge Brand
subskills.description: Extends the duration of Sakura Brand to applied by self to 20.0s. 5-sequence Basic ATKs gains 20.0% Total DMG Multiplier.
